page.description: Loads a web component into an A5W page and returns a pointer to its data structure.
page.syntax: Data_Structure as P = A5W_LOAD_COMPONENT( Component_Name as C )

argument.name: Data_Structure
argument.description: A dot variable containing the component data structure.

argument.name: Component_Name
argument.description: The name of the component to load.

page.discussion: The A5W_LOAD_COMPONENT() function loads a web component into an A5W page and returns a pointer to its data structure.
